sources.title: Sword of Venus (1953) American adventure film directed by Harold Daniels
sources.description:
All-new adventures of the Heir of Monte Cristo! 
The son of the legendary Count of Monte Cristo is framed for a murder he didn't commit by one of his father's bitterest enemies, a man who is determined to get his hands on the family's wealth.
An epic adventure of courage, betrayal, and redemption unfolds beneath the gleaming edge of the Sword of Venus.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/mUfhHPcmjIo


Original title: Sword of Venus (1953) AKA: Island of Monte Cristo
This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director: Harold Daniels
Writers: Jack Pollexfen, Aubrey Wisberg
Stars: Robert Clarke, Catherine McLeod, Dan O'Herlihy 
Genres: Classic, Crime, Adventure, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:38 A tale of deception, betrayal, and a duel between father and son unfolds in Paris.
12:00 Intrigue and deception unfold as characters plan to destroy the House of Monte Cristo.
18:45 Intrigue and deception unfold as characters navigate through a stormy night at an inn.
30:38 Murder trial representation by a lawyer for an unknown man with potential consequences.
34:08 A dramatic turn of events unfolds as a man faces trial and finds a surprising solution to escape death.
41:18 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as a prisoner escapes and a dangerous plan is set in motion.
52:59 Deception, betrayal, and a dangerous scheme unfold as a man is forced to impersonate a deceased heir to secure a fortune.
57:20 Intrigue and deception unfold as the Count of Monte Cristo seeks revenge on his enemies.
1:06:11 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as a group of individuals engage in a high-stakes business deal.


@CultCinemaClassics

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
